Attacks.Name: Slash
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, Sandslash gains power equal to the damage dealt. Wild: This attack gains the Pierce effect, changing one of the target's defense successes to a blank.

Attacks.Name: Earthquake
Attacks.Effect: All characters within Range 2, including allies, suffer damage. Wild: Targets gain the Stagger special condition.

Attacks.Name: Rapid Spin
Attacks.Effect: Sandslash may advance S after the attack is resolved. Wild: The target gains the Slow special condition.

Superpowers.Name: Sand Veil
Superpowers.Effect: Enemy characters within Range 2 of Sandslash must reroll one success in their attack rolls.

Superpowers.Name: Defense Curl
Superpowers.Effect: Sandslash gains 1 additional die in defense rolls until the start of its next activation. If used before Earthquake, increase Earthquake's range by 1.

Attacks.Name: Drill Run
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled, Sandslash may reroll up to two dice in its attack roll and push the target S.

Superpowers.Name: Sandstorm
Superpowers.Effect: Enemy characters within Range 2 of Sandslash suffer -1 defense die until the end of the round.
